actions.name: Actions
actions.description: Multi-Attack: 1×Grasp and 1×Crush Grasp [Melee Attack]: 4 (d8) and Restrained Crush [Rush]: Any Huge or smaller Being in its path is pushed in front of it for the Move. If there is no open space within Close for the Being to go when this happens, it takes 3 (d6) for every 5' of Speed this Being has remaining. Immutable: It can't be transformed.
